question: What are by far the most common type of invertebrate?

nodes.text: Spiders are by far the most common type of invertebrate.
Crustaceans are by far the most common type of invertebrate.
Corals are by far the most common type of invertebrate.
Insects are by far the most common type of invertebrate.
